title: Chasing Rainbows
description: In one earth shattering moment, Sheldon Henry Stottz's near perfect life is changed forever.The influenza epidemic of 1918 had already taken many lives. In what seemed like a single breath, the people Sheldon Henry loved the most where gone, and his rock-solid faith shaken to the core. Why was God letting this happen? What had he done to deserve such agony, such utter pain? Soon, Sheldon stumbles upon a young woman in tears. She's deeply broken, and while trying to offer some comfort, Sheldon suddenly realizes that God has spared him for a purpose; a purpose he would perhaps soon understand.
author: Lynette Chambers
